Name: Fright Night Sex Fest
About the game: Leave your Carnal Fear behind, on this Night of the Giving Head! Dangerous Flings Featuring a growing roster of spooky-themed parody characters, you’ll see familiar faces, but they may be sexier than you remember… Dark Funtasies Each immortally lust-filled scenario has a quick 'visual novel' story to set the scene, before you join in the fun! Wet Nightmares These scarily immersive environments are perfect for the things that go hump in the night! From steamy intimate scenes to multi-girl romps, expect to explore elements of the taboo… Fear Amor Choose your female companions and join them on a journey to the dark side. Be prepared to Gore 'n Score! Thrilling Features: An interactive PC experience unlike any other! 5 stories in visual novel format and interactive sex Custom combinations of sexual partners Supports No-VR mode, with only a PC & mouse (no VR headset) VR support for Vive and Rift headsets Additional girls and scenes will be available via DLC This is no Hack-n-slash... this is HACK 'N FLASH!
